name: Rage Game (Master Zikki)
description:
Hi,

I hope you enjoy and rage a lot in this game. Currently there are 3 difficulties: Easy, Medium and Hard. And i have tested this game im 99.9% sure its physially possible. However if you do think that this is impossible please do not hesitate to message me. But if you report it because of Level 10 or a similar issue than i cna guarantee it works it just extremely hard to balance the Player on a single Pixel.

While Easy and Medium are not much except that easy has 1 extra heart. but other than that both reset the Scene when you have 0 hp.

The differnce to Hard mode is that you only have one life and if you die, the game will close.

A helpful trick is Pressing R to reset the Scene it works on any difficulty even Hard mode. 

Take note this game was only whiped up in under a week, so dont expect too much.

The first Person in each difficulty that finishes will get a email and a Code that you can send to my email, after that i will add your Name to the Highscore list with the difficulty that you cleared it with. The current ones are still available:

Easy - Medium - Hard
